edu.ccsu.interfaces

Interface ProductFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceAndSensorFactory

    public interface ProductFactory
    Interface that specifies methods that can be used to create different devices and sensors
    Author:
    Adrian, Kim, GaYoung

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Device makeDevice(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Creates a device based on the name and returns it
      Fan makeFan(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Use method to create Fan device (currently supports the Grove MiniFan v1.1)
      LightEnabledDevice makeLightEnabledDevice(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Generates a light enabled device (Currently LEDs are supported)
      ScreenEnabledDevice makeScreenEnabledDevice(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Used to create a screen enabled device (currently supports the LCD display)
      Sensor makeSensor(java.lang.String sensor, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Creates a sensor based on the name and returns it
